  • Functional style: å‡½æ•°å¼é£æ ¼
    • To keep $$\sigma_1$$ in pristine condition while creating create $$\sigma_2$$ and $$\sigma_3$$
  • Imperative style: å‘½ä»¤å¼é£æ ¼
